item.title: Installing Docker in Ubuntu 20.10 (Groovy Gorilla)
item.description:
Ubuntu ❤️ Docker

Hello everyone,

Recently I installed the latest non LTS version of Ubuntu 20.10 Groovy Gorilla, and found it a bit of a hassle to install Docker with this tutorial, through the repository step.

item.title: About
item.description: This blog was created out of need to document my thoughs, projects and ideias to my friends and family.Through all my years, out of necessity i built project or solved problems and never documented them. While growing up i always asked everyone on the why of things, and quickly, i concluded that people do not care about the whys. I believe on understanding the why, because after deeper understanding, the solution becomes obvious and you gain another tool in your belt.

item.title: Hello World
item.description:
Hello world!

This is my first post on my new created blog.

I’m a Software Engineer that moved countries in a mist of a pandemic. Here i share my ideas, projects and interests. To celebrate i leave my favorite game of all time as a easter egg.
